events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the package is still not delivered. The tracking status hasn’t updated in several days.
The message was reviewed and the issue was classified under delivery delay due to the mention of late shipping and tracking problems.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the customer’s delivery delay inquiry to provide the necessary assistance.
Hello! I’m Emily from customer support. I understand your order hasn’t arrived yet and I’m here to help you track it down.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the tracking information so I can investigate the shipping delay further?
Thank you, Emily. My order number is 123456789 and the tracking code is XY987654321. The status hasn’t changed since it left the warehouse.
I contacted the shipping provider and they confirmed a delay due to weather conditions. Your package is expected to arrive within the next 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the update. It’s frustrating but I understand the reasons for the delay. I’ll wait for a few more days then.
Thank you for your patience. We have resolved your inquiry and will keep monitoring the shipment to ensure delivery is completed soon.
Just following up to confirm that your order has arrived safely and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your delivery delay issue.
Since we have not heard any further issues, we are closing this case now. Please contact us again if you need any more help.
